attributes.action: Allow the Welsh Assembly equal legislative powers to those held by the Scottish Assembly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland has long had legislative powers greatly exceeding those available to Wales. These are often used very sensibly to support the needs  and wishes of the Scottish population. Wales has many differing needs or wishes than those of England. This sensible measure would allow Wales to meet needs according to the wishes of the people and population of the Principality of Wales, not in accordance to the views of Westminster.
